JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Boarding Call for Shift managers, Baristas, Kitchen assistants, Cafe employees, Service crew and Casual employees at Copenhagen Airport
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are mass hiring for the upcoming season and new store openings:

What will you do?

  • Catering, serving, receiving and speaking to guests
  • Ensure guests have a good experience
  • Cashering responsibilities
  • Keeping your work environment clean and tidy
  • Manage and replenish stock

Who are you?

  • Freshers or experienced in hospitality or retail
  • Willingness to learn on-the-job
  • An excellent team player
  • You become happy when guests become happy
  • You can peak when it gets busy
  • You like to work in a team
  • Business proficiency in English
  • At least one Scandinavian language is desirable

What we offer?

  • Flexibility (Contracts ranging from 100, 80, 60 and 40 hours per month)
  • Salary, benefits and work conditions as per the Collective agreement
  • Staff meal and discounts
  • A fun work environment
  • Learning and development opportunities to support career aspirations and growth

What’s Next? 

If you want to join us in this exciting adventure & be a part of the HMSHost family, apply now by telling us why you are our new team member. Mention in the subject line the position you are applying for.
